Patterns_Site

5.1. BOOLFLIP/FARG: function argument is True, should be False

 Buggy: func(listArg1, True, listArg2)
 Fixed: func(listArg1, False, listArg2)

pattern TEMP for
        c: call
    with
        b: BOOLEAN
    where
        b ∈ c.args
        b = True
    fix
        c [b ← False]
    End
Examples:

Closure-70

Bug: 70, Project: Closure

Codec-7

Bug: 7, Project: Codec

dihfvcdhfbvhfdbhj

False/True Patterns:

 Fixed: func(listArg1, False, listArg2)
